Description of incident: Radiant Systems accidentally transmitted Fisherman's Restaurant employee information to another Radiant Systems restaurant customer.  The error occurred from May 3, 2013 through September 24, 2013.  Radiant Systems learned of the issue on September 23 and notifications were sent in early October.  Full names, Social Security numbers, dates of birth, gender, marital status and number of dependents, addresses, telephone numbers, and personnel information were exposed.
